text: :For the Qing dynasty Chinese reform, see New Policies; for the Song dynasty Chinese reform, see New Policies (Song dynasty) New Policy (born 1957) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse sired by Khaled and trained by John H. Adams shortly after his retirement as a jockey. He was the grandsire of Town Policy (1975–1984) by Reb's Policy (b. 1967). ==External links== *Pedigree at Pedigreequery Category:1957 racehorse births Category:Racehorses bred in California Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Thoroughbred family 20-a
title: New Policy
